ai_settings.title: AI Settings
ai_settings.chatgpt_integration_desc: Follow the steps below to create your CV using your own ChatGPT account:
ai_settings.chatgpt_integration_step1: Go to the "CV Expert GPT" page (Link will be added soon).
ai_settings.chatgpt_integration_step2: Create the raw content of your CV by chatting with the GPT.
ai_settings.chatgpt_integration_step3: The GPT will generate a special "magic link" for you.
ai_settings.chatgpt_integration_step4: Paste this link into your browser to instantly see your CV preview.
ai_settings.gemini_api_key_desc: You can enter your own Gemini API key here to use the in-app AI features (e.g., fill with LinkedIn profile, ATS Analysis). This key is only stored in your browser.
ai_settings.gemini_api_key_placeholder: Enter Your Gemini API Key Here
ai_settings.api_key_info: To learn how to get your API key, you can visit the <1>Google AI Studio</1> page.
ai_settings.key_saved_error: Could not validate API key. Please check and try again.

form.project_desc_placeholder:
• Write concise, measurable achievements
• e.g., Built backend services with C#, CQRS, Docker, PostgreSQL
• e.g., Implemented JWT authentication & authorization
form.degree_program_placeholder: Degree and Program (e.g. BSc Computer Engineering)

ai_feed.title: AI Data Feeds
ai_feed.description: Automatically populate your CV by uploading data from your digital platforms.
ai_feed.import_linkedin_desc: Go to your LinkedIn profile, save the page as HTML, and upload it here.
ai_feed.parsing_linkedin: AI is parsing your LinkedIn profile...
ai_feed.import_success: CV data has been successfully imported!
ai_feed.api_key_missing: API Key is not set. Please set it in the AI Settings page before uploading.
